issues.title: God Class: TestGeneratorService
issues.description: TestGeneratorService has 2750 lines with 50+ methods handling AST parsing, test generation for multiple frameworks, TDD workflow, property testing, and data generation. This violates Single Responsibility Principle.
issues.recommendation: Split into separate services: ASTAnalyzer, JestTestGenerator, MochaTestGenerator, PytestTestGenerator, TDDWorkflowManager, PropertyTestGenerator, TestDataGenerator

issues.title: God Class: SecurityScannerService
issues.description: SecurityScannerService handles SAST, DAST, dependency scanning, pattern matching, crawling, and injection testing. Too many responsibilities in one class.
issues.recommendation: Extract into: SASTScanner, DASTScanner, DependencyScanner, SecurityPatternMatcher, WebCrawler, InjectionTester

issues.title: God Class: WorkflowOrchestrator
issues.description: WorkflowOrchestrator manages workflow execution, step execution, condition evaluation, event publishing, persistence, and built-in workflow registration.
issues.recommendation: Extract: WorkflowExecutionEngine, StepExecutor, ConditionEvaluator, WorkflowEventPublisher, WorkflowPersistence, BuiltInWorkflowFactory

issues.title: Large Class: QueenCoordinator
issues.description: QueenCoordinator handles task management, work stealing, domain coordination, agent management, and metrics collection.
issues.recommendation: Consider extracting TaskManager, WorkStealingEngine, DomainCoordinator, and MetricsCollector as separate classes

issues.title: Repeated Configuration Objects
issues.description: Similar DEFAULT_CONFIG patterns repeated across 12 domain coordinators with similar structure but no shared abstraction.
issues.recommendation: Create a BaseCoordinatorConfig interface and factory function for consistent configuration handling

issues.title: Primitive Obsession with String IDs
issues.description: Task IDs, agent IDs, and execution IDs are plain strings throughout the codebase without type safety or validation.
issues.recommendation: Create branded types or value objects: TaskId, AgentId, ExecutionId with factory functions and validation

issues.title: Long Parameter Lists in Constructors
issues.description: QueenCoordinator constructor takes 8 parameters; other coordinators take 4-6 parameters.
issues.recommendation: Use Builder pattern or Configuration object pattern for complex constructors

issues.title: Feature Envy in Event Publishing
issues.description: Multiple private methods (publishWorkflowStarted, publishStepCompleted, etc.) format and publish events. These could be moved to a dedicated EventPublisher service.
issues.recommendation: Extract event publishing logic to a dedicated service or use event sourcing pattern

issues.title: Duplicate Error Handling Patterns
issues.description: 559 catch blocks across 136 files with varying error handling approaches. Many follow similar patterns but implemented inconsistently.
issues.recommendation: Create error handling utilities and standardize error wrapping patterns across the codebase

issues.title: Unused Plugin Interfaces
issues.description: Plugin system defined with extensive configuration options but only used for domain registration, not actual plugin loading.
issues.recommendation: Either implement full plugin system or simplify to domain registration

issues.title: Domain Interface Changes
issues.description: Adding a new domain requires changes to 24+ files: interfaces, coordinator, plugin, services, MCP handlers, routing, etc.
issues.recommendation: Use convention over configuration and auto-discovery for domain registration

issues.title: Magic Numbers in Configuration
issues.description: Numeric constants used directly without named constants or configuration.
issues.recommendation: Extract to named constants with descriptive names and document units

issues.title: Long Method: performDynamicScan
issues.description: performDynamicScan method is 286 lines handling URL validation, header analysis, cookie checking, file exposure scanning, CORS analysis, link crawling, injection testing, and form analysis.
issues.recommendation: Extract into smaller focused methods: analyzeSecurityHeaders, analyzeCookies, scanSensitiveFiles, analyzeCORS, crawlAndTest, testInjections, analyzeForms

issues.title: Long Method: performAuthenticatedScan
issues.description: performAuthenticatedScan is 281 lines with similar structure to performDynamicScan but for authenticated contexts.
issues.recommendation: Consolidate shared logic between authenticated and unauthenticated scans using strategy pattern

issues.title: Long Method: registerBuiltInWorkflows
issues.description: registerBuiltInWorkflows defines 5 workflow definitions inline, totaling 358 lines of configuration data.
issues.recommendation: Move workflow definitions to separate YAML/JSON configuration files or dedicated workflow definition files

issues.title: Excessive Section Comments
issues.description: Heavy use of '// ============' separator comments throughout codebase. While organized, these add visual clutter.
issues.recommendation: Rely on IDE folding and class/method organization instead of separator comments

issues.title: Excessive 'as any' Type Assertions
issues.description: 42 occurrences of 'as any' type assertions indicating type system workarounds.
issues.recommendation: Review each assertion and either fix underlying type issues or use more specific type guards

issues.title: Console Logging in Production Code
issues.description: 501 console.log/error/warn calls. CLI output is expected, but 229 calls are in non-CLI service code.
issues.recommendation: Implement structured logging service with log levels. Replace direct console calls with logger injection.

issues.title: TODO Comments Without Tracking
issues.description: 5 TODO comments in gap-detector.ts without issue tracking numbers or assignees.
issues.recommendation: Convert TODOs to tracked issues or implement them

issues.title: Inconsistent Naming: 'Sub' Suffix
issues.description: Agent names with '-sub' suffix are unclear. Purpose of 'sub' designation not documented.
issues.recommendation: Use descriptive names that indicate the specialization (e.g., 'qe-test-data-relationship-manager')

issues.title: Large Interface: ISecurityScannerService
issues.description: ISecurityScannerService has 10 methods covering SAST, DAST, dependency scanning, and combined scanning.
issues.recommendation: Apply Interface Segregation Principle: ISASTScanner, IDASTScanner, IDependencyScanner

issues.title: Deep Nesting in Scan Methods
issues.description: Nested conditionals up to 6 levels deep in DAST scanning methods.
issues.recommendation: Use early returns and extract helper methods to flatten nesting

issues.title: High Class Coupling: QueenCoordinator
issues.description: QueenCoordinator depends on 8 external services/interfaces injected via constructor.
issues.recommendation: Consider Facade pattern or splitting responsibilities to reduce coupling

issues.title: Complex Security Regex Patterns
issues.description: 38 complex regex patterns defined inline for security scanning. Hard to maintain and test.
issues.recommendation: Move patterns to separate configuration with named patterns and unit tests

issues.title: God File: QE Agent Registry
issues.description: Single file defines all 78 QE agent profiles. Hard to navigate and modify.
issues.recommendation: Split into domain-specific agent registries or use auto-discovery from agent directories

issues.title: Multiple Return Statements
issues.description: Some methods have up to 12 return statements making control flow hard to follow.
issues.recommendation: Refactor to reduce cyclomatic complexity and consolidate exit points where practical

issues.title: Unused Parameters with Underscore
issues.description: 15 parameters prefixed with underscore indicating they are unused but required by interface.
issues.recommendation: Review interface design to see if parameters can be removed or made optional

issues.title: Potential Race Condition in Work Stealing
issues.description: Work stealing timer runs on interval but task assignment and stealing are not atomic. Multiple domains could attempt to steal the same task.
issues.recommendation: Implement distributed locking or use atomic compare-and-swap for task stealing

issues.title: Unbounded Task History
issues.description: tasks Map grows unbounded as completed tasks are never removed. Long-running systems will accumulate memory.
issues.recommendation: Implement task eviction policy (e.g., keep last N tasks or tasks from last T hours)

issues.title: Unbounded Task Duration Array
issues.description: taskDurations array grows unbounded. Used for average calculation but never trimmed.
issues.recommendation: Use sliding window or circular buffer for duration tracking

issues.title: Silent Error Swallowing in Cleanup
issues.description: cleanupAndExit catches and ignores all errors during cleanup. Errors may go unnoticed.
issues.recommendation: Log cleanup errors even if not rethrowing

issues.title: Unvalidated Optional Parameters
issues.description: Optional protocolExecutor and workflowExecutor may be undefined but called without null checks in some paths.
issues.recommendation: Add explicit null checks or use Optional/Maybe pattern

issues.title: Timeout Promise Never Resolved
issues.description: Timeout promise in runWorkflow creates a timer that may not be cleared if workflow completes before timeout.
issues.recommendation: Store timeout ID and clear it on workflow completion

issues.title: Unclosed File Handles
issues.description: fs.readFileSync used without try-finally for cleanup. While sync reads don't require explicit close, async file operations in some code paths may leak handles.
issues.recommendation: Use fs.promises with proper try-finally or using statements

issues.title: Empty Array Division
issues.description: Average task duration calculation may divide by zero if taskDurations is empty.
issues.recommendation: Add length check before division

issues.title: Missing Interface Documentation
issues.description: 35+ interfaces lack JSDoc documentation for their purpose and usage context.
issues.recommendation: Add JSDoc comments to all public interfaces with @description, @example where appropriate

issues.title: Low Test Coverage for Security Scanner
issues.description: Complex security scanning logic has limited test coverage. DAST methods especially undertested.
issues.recommendation: Add integration tests for DAST scanning with mock HTTP server

issues.title: High Cyclomatic Complexity
issues.description: Several files have methods with cyclomatic complexity above 10.
issues.recommendation: Refactor high-complexity methods into smaller, focused functions

issues.title: Circular Import Risk
issues.description: Coordination modules have tight coupling with potential for circular imports.
issues.recommendation: Use dependency injection and interface-based decoupling

issues.title: Missing Error Types
issues.description: All errors are generic Error instances. No domain-specific error types for better error handling.
issues.recommendation: Create error hierarchy: QEError, DomainError, TaskError, WorkflowError with proper inheritance

issues.title: Inconsistent Result Type Usage
issues.description: Some methods return Result<T, Error>, others throw directly. Inconsistent error handling contract.
issues.recommendation: Standardize on Result type for all async operations or define clear boundary for each pattern

issues.title: Hardcoded Default Values
issues.description: Many default configuration values are hardcoded inline rather than in a central configuration.
issues.recommendation: Create centralized defaults configuration file

issues.title: No API Version Management
issues.description: No versioning strategy for MCP tools and domain APIs. Breaking changes could affect consumers.
issues.recommendation: Implement API versioning strategy with backward compatibility guarantees

issues.title: Index Barrel Files Too Large
issues.description: Index files re-export many modules which can cause bundle bloat and circular dependency issues.
issues.recommendation: Use more granular imports instead of barrel imports

issues.title: Limited Observability
issues.description: No structured tracing or metrics beyond basic counters. Hard to debug production issues.
issues.recommendation: Add OpenTelemetry tracing for cross-domain request flow

issues.title: No Input Sanitization for MCP Tools
issues.description: MCP tool handlers accept user input without consistent validation/sanitization.
issues.recommendation: Add input validation layer using Zod or similar for all MCP tool inputs

issues.title: Synchronous File Operations
issues.description: Uses fs.readFileSync which blocks event loop. Should use async operations.
issues.recommendation: Replace with fs.promises.readFile for async file operations

hotspots.description: Files with highest concentration of issues

positiveFindings.description: Well-implemented patterns observed in the codebase

items.title: Strong DDD Structure
items.description: 12 well-defined bounded contexts with clear separation of concerns at domain level

items.title: Result Type Pattern
items.description: Consistent use of Result<T, Error> for error handling in many places

items.title: No TypeScript Ignores
items.description: Zero @ts-ignore or @ts-expect-error annotations - good type discipline

items.title: Proper Readonly Usage
items.description: 414 uses of 'private readonly' showing good immutability practices

items.title: Interface-First Design
items.description: Most services implement well-defined interfaces enabling testability

items.title: Event-Driven Architecture
items.description: Cross-domain communication via events enables loose coupling

immediate.title: Fix Memory Leaks
immediate.description: Implement task eviction policy and fix unbounded array growth

immediate.title: Address Race Condition
immediate.description: Implement proper locking for work stealing operations

shortTerm.title: Refactor God Classes
shortTerm.description: Split large services into focused components

shortTerm.title: Implement Structured Logging
shortTerm.description: Replace console.* with structured logging service

longTerm.title: Add Domain-Specific Error Types
longTerm.description: Create error hierarchy for better error handling

longTerm.title: Improve Test Coverage
longTerm.description: Add integration tests for undertested components

qualityGateVerdict.reason: 3 critical issues detected (PB-001, PB-002, PB-003) that require immediate attention before release
